items.summary: Significantly increase the XP thresholds required to advance each player level in the backend XP/level progression system. The XP cost per level should scale much more steeply so players need considerably more accumulated XP to reach higher levels.

Update the frontend level progression system in `frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts` to mirror the new backend XP thresholds exactly, so that the displayed level, XP progress bar, and XP boundaries in the PlayerProfile screen remain consistent with backend calculations.
